comment.author: 70251312@N00
comment._content:
Alameda, California, is known as The Island City, in San Francisco Bay.

Scandalous abbreviated bathing costumes (skirtless) were in the news back then. This lady was arrested for wearing one:
[http://www.flickr.com/photos/library_of_congress/4586901966/in/photostream/]
